name: Rugs
short_description: Rugs that come in 12 colors and 2 sizes.
long_description:
I noticed there weren't many rugs in the game, so I made these!
This rug comes in red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, dark blue, purple, pink, brown, white, gray, and black. It has a large size (the size of the vanilla Fancy Rug) and a small size (the size of the vanilla Circular Rug).
You'll have to rotate the item to get some colors.
